about_the_game:
AudioTheory Guitars is the ultimate reference tool for guitar notes and chords. Featuring a built-in keyboard, each note reacts to your input across the customisable chord and fretboard diagrams. For anyone who's ever wished music theory was that little bit more straightforward – this is the software for you.

The full set of features:


  • Seamlessly transcribe between piano and guitar using a straight-forward colour coding system and notation highlighting. Play a note on the keyboard, or directly from the chord and fretboard diagrams to see where it is across all formats.

  • Set your tuning and capo. Everything else adjusts accordingly – no need for a chord transposition chart.



  • Choose your chords with open, power, barre, sus2 and dim7 chord sheets with fullscreen diagrams and playback options.



  • Exclude notes and never play out of key again. Your fretboard diagram now only shows the notes you need and your keyboard doesn't play the ones you don't.



  • Scale presets you can quickly apply to the application. Save and load functions to easily swap between customised views.

  • MIDI support. Connect an external MIDI input device to control the on-screen keyboard.

  • Full customisation. Select the chords you want. Left-handed mode for left-handed players. Set your fretboard size, number of strings, start fret and per-string tuning.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04, Ubuntu 24.04
  • Processor: 64bit only (x64 architecture)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: ALSA (libasound2) must be installed for MIDI input to work

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur 11.0+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

name: AudioTheory Guitars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 32bit binary is included, however please note that only the 64bit app recieves new updates beyond version 2.0.2
